written abbreviation for
millimolar : Healthy volunteers had average sodium and chloride levels of 26.7 and 21.2 mM respectively. The experiment was repeated eight times without and with 5.56 mM of glucose.
More examplesFewer examplesA high salt level (over 60 mM chloride) indicates cystic fibrosis.The reaction mixture contained 50 mM K-phosphate buffer.Phenylmethyl sulphonyl fluoride was added at 1 mM concentration.

MEASURES written abbreviation for millimetre (= a unit of length equal to 0.001 metres): It measures 119 mm in length by 63 mm in width by 13 mm deep.
